original_text: My God, remember what these people have done. They have not been faithful to you as your priests. They have spoiled the covenant that you made with the priests and the other descendants of Levi.
korean_text: 내 하나님이여 그들이 제사장의 직분을 더럽히고 제사장의 직분과 레위 사람에 대한 언약을 어겼사오니 그들을 기억하옵소서

sentences.original_text: My God, remember what these people have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 하나님, 이 사람들이 한 일을 기억하세요.

sentences.original_text: They have not been faithful to you
that you made with the priests
and the other descendants of Levi.
